TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_gong_Hkawan, title = gong_Hkawan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/gong_Hkawan} }

S.FORM: ki'an quilh balay ga cyux maki gong Hkawan. mqyanux na sraral sraral ga pitu ngnsal qalang myan,mwah pcbaq muya pinbahuw lga wal maki Sqoyaw qalang qasa la.
